title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7801.3 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7801.3 - Location

State Regulations

Records shall be available for public inspection and
copying at the following address: State Energy Office, Agency Building 2, Empire State Plaza, Albany, NY 12223. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7801.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
